nodes.text: Caylagos was a crime boss who operated on the planet of Wielu during the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. At one time the infamous smuggler Rook Pryce worked with Caylagos, and sold a number of weapons to the crime boss which belonged to a rival criminal boss, a Nautolan named Shon Ti'Ja.
Caylagos was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: The Smuggler's Code, a digest sized comic book released in 2013 and written by Justin Aclin.
